## Plans

### remediate_install

Bolt plan to install Puppet Remediate.

This bolt plan

#### Examples

##### Upload license file

```puppet
bolt file upload /tmp/license.json /tmp/vr-license.json -n <host> --user <user> \
          [--private_key <path to privare-key>] [--password] --no-host-key-check
```

##### Requirements check

```puppet
bolt plan run remediate_install::check_requirements -n <host> --run-as root --user <user> \
          [--private_key <path to privare-key>] [--password] --no-host-key-check
```

##### Remediate installation

```puppet
bolt plan run remediate_install install_docker=y init_swarm=y license_file=/tmp/license.json \
      install_compose=y install_remediate=y configure_firewall=y -n <host> --run-as root \
      --user <user> [--private_key <path to privare-key>] [--password] --no-host-key-check \
      [--sudo-password [PASSWORD]]
```

#### Parameters

The following parameters are available in the `remediate_install` plan.

##### `$nodes`

The target nodes

##### `$install_docker`

Flag fpr Docker install. Valid input: 'y' or 'no'

##### `$init_swarm`

Initialize Docker Swarm during installation. This will initialize a first manager swarm node.
Valid input: 'y' or 'n'

##### `$install_compose`

Install docker-compose binary which is needed for Remediate installation. Valid input: 'y' or 'n'.

##### `$compose_version`

The version of docker-compose to install if installation of docker-compose is requested.
Please keep in mind that Remedieate needs version 1.24.1 of docker-compose at least.

##### `$install_remediate`

Install Remediate. Valid input: 'y' or 'n'

##### `$configure_firewall`

Serup a firewall with all rules needed for Remediate. If unsure please set this parameter to no
and do the firewall configuration yourself. Valid input: 'y' or 'n'

##### `$license_file`

Full qualified filename of teh Remediate license file.

##### `$docker_users`

Users to add to the docker group

##### `$compose_version`

The version of docker-compose to install if installation of docker-compose is requested.
Please keep in mind that Remedieate needs version 1.24.1 of docker-compose at least.

##### `$compose_install_path`

Path where to install docker-compose binary

##### `$win_install_dir`

Directory where to install Remediate on Windows boxes

##### `$unix_install_dir`

Directory where to install Remediate on Unix systems

##### `$enforce_system_requirements`

Set to true the installer breaks if the system requirements for Remediate are not met.

##### `$noop_mode`

Run apply commands in noop mode. If set to true no changes will be made to the system

##### `$docker_ee`

Flag to install Docker Enterprise. Must be set to true on Windows boxes.

##### `nodes`

Data type: `TargetSpec`



##### `install_docker`

Data type: `Enum['y', 'n']`



##### `init_swarm`

Data type: `Enum['y', 'n']`



##### `install_compose`

Data type: `Enum['y', 'n']`



##### `install_remediate`

Data type: `Enum['y', 'n']`



##### `configure_firewall`

Data type: `Enum['y', 'n']`



Default value: 'n'

##### `license_file`

Data type: `String`



Default value: `undef`

##### `docker_users`

Data type: `Array`



Default value: ['centos']

##### `compose_version`

Data type: `String`



Default value: '1.24.1'

##### `compose_install_path`

Data type: `String`



Default value: '/usr/local/bin'

##### `win_install_dir`

Data type: `String`



Default value: 'C:/Users/Administrator/remediate'

##### `unix_install_dir`

Data type: `String`



Default value: '/opt/remediate'

##### `enforce_system_requirements`

Data type: `Boolean`



Default value: `false`

##### `noop_mode`

Data type: `Boolean`



Default value: `false`

##### `docker_ee`

Data type: `Boolean`



Default value: `false`

### remediate_install::check_requirements

Check Remediate installation prerequiasites

#### Examples

##### Requirements check on Windows host

```puppet
bolt plan run remediate_install::check_requirements -n <host> --user Administrator \
          --password <password> --transport winrm --no-ssl
```

##### Requiremets check on Ubuntu host

```puppet
bolt plan run remediate_install::check_requirements -n <host> --run-as root --user ubuntu \
          --private_key <private key file> --no-host-key-check
```

#### Parameters

The following parameters are available in the `remediate_install::check_requirements` plan.

##### `$nodes`

Nodes to run on

##### `nodes`

Data type: `TargetSpec`
